briefdescription.para: Creates a new empty graph.

simplesect.para: Pointer to the starting vertex of the graph.

briefdescription.para: Creates a new vertex for the graph.

parameterdescription.para: Name of the vertex city.
Vertex identifier code.

simplesect.para: Pointer to the newly created vertex.

briefdescription.para: Inserts a new vertex into the graph in alphabetical order.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the starting vertex of the graph.
Pointer to the new vertex to insert.
Pointer to a variable that stores the result of the insert operation.

simplesect.para: Pointer to the starting vertex of the graph.

briefdescription.para: Displays on screen all vertices and their respective adjacency lists of the graph.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the starting vertex of the graph.

briefdescription.para: Frees the memory allocated to the graph and its adjacency lists.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the starting vertex of the graph.

simplesect.para: Pointer to the starting vertex of the graph (NULL).

briefdescription.para: Gets the identifier code of a vertex from the city name.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the starting vertex of the graph.
Name of the city to be searched.

simplesect.para: Vertex identifier code or -1 if the graph is empty, -2 if the city is not found.

briefdescription.para: Finds a vertex from the city name.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the starting vertex of the graph.
Name of the city to be searched.

simplesect.para: Pointer to the found vertex, or NULL if the city is not found.

briefdescription.para: Fetch a vertex from the identifier code.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the starting vertex of the graph.
Identifier code of the vertex to be searched.

simplesect.para: Pointer to the found vertex or NULL if the code is not found.

briefdescription.para: Resets the "visited" flag of all graph vertices to false.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the starting vertex of the graph.

simplesect.para: Pointer to the starting vertex of the graph.

briefdescription.para: Creates a new adjacency list node.

parameterdescription.para: Adjacent vertex identifier code.
Value of distance between vertices.

simplesect.para: Pointer to the newly created node.

briefdescription.para: Inserts a new adjacent vertex into an adjacency list.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the starting vertex of the graph.
Name of the city of origin.
Name of the destination city.
Value of distance between vertices.
Pointer to a variable that stores the result of the insert operation.

simplesect.para: Pointer to the starting vertex of the graph.

memberdef.argsstring: (Vertex *g, int codOrigin, int codDest, float valuedistance, bool *res)
memberdef.name: insertAdjacentVertexCod

briefdescription.para: Inserts a new adjacent vertex in an adjacency list based on the vertex identifier codes.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the starting vertex of the graph.
Code identifying the city of origin.
Code identifying the destination city.
Value of distance between vertices.
Pointer to a variable that stores the result of the insert operation.

simplesect.para: Pointer to the starting vertex of the graph.

briefdescription.para: Checks if an adjacent vertex already exists in an adjacency list.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the first node in the adjacency list.
Code identifying the adjacent vertex to be searched.

simplesect.para: true if the adjacent vertex exists in the list, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Inserts a new adjacent vertex to a given vertex in the graph.

parameterdescription.para: The head of the vertex list.
The new adjacent vertex to be inserted.
A pointer to a boolean variable that will be set to true if the insertion is successful.

simplesect.para: The head of the vertex list.

briefdescription.para: Recursively displays the adjacent vertices of a given vertex.

parameterdescription.para: The head of the adjacent vertex list.

briefdescription.para: Recursively destroys the adjacent vertex list.

parameterdescription.para: The head of the adjacent vertex list.

simplesect.para: NULL.

memberdef.argsstring: (Vertex *g, int src, int dest, int pathCount)
memberdef.name: countPaths

briefdescription.para: Counts the number of paths between two vertices in the graph.

parameterdescription.para: The head of the vertex list.
The code of the source vertex.
The code of the destination vertex.
The number of paths found so far.

simplesect.para: The number of paths between the source and destination vertices.

briefdescription.para: Counts the number of paths between two vertices in the graph, given their names.

parameterdescription.para: The head of the vertex list.
The name of the source vertex.
The name of the destination vertex.
The number of paths found so far.

simplesect.para: The number of paths between the source and destination vertices.

briefdescription.para: Recursively performs a depth-first search on the graph to find a path between two vertices.

parameterdescription.para: The head of the vertex list.
The code of the origin vertex.
The code of the destination vertex.

simplesect.para: True if a path is found, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Recursively performs a depth-first search on the graph to find a path between two vertices, given their names.

parameterdescription.para: The head of the vertex list.
The name of the source vertex.
The name of the destination vertex.

simplesect.para: True if a path is found, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Finds the shortest path from a given vertex to all other vertices in the graph using Dijkstra's algorithm.

parameterdescription.para: The head of the vertex list.
The number of vertices in the graph.
The code of the vertex to start the search from.

simplesect.para: A struct containing the shortest distance and previous vertex for each vertex in the graph.

briefdescription.para: ShowAllPath - Function that displays the shortest path and distance to all vertices in the graph.

parameterdescription.para: Best struct containing the shortest distance and previous vertex for each vertex in the graph
Number of vertices in the graph
Index of the starting vertex

briefdescription.para: SaveGraph - Function that saves the graph to a binary file.

parameterdescription.para: Head of the linked list of vertices in the graph
Name of the file to save the graph to

simplesect.para: : 1 if the graph was successfully saved, -1 if the file could not be opened, -2 if the head of the linked list is NULL

briefdescription.para: SaveAdj - Function that saves the adjacency list of a vertex to a binary file.

parameterdescription.para: Head of the linked list of adjacent vertices
Name of the file to save the adjacency list to
Code of the vertex that the adjacency list belongs to

simplesect.para: : 1 if the adjacency list was successfully saved, -1 if the file could not be opened, -2 if the head of the linked list is NULL

briefdescription.para: LoadGraph - Function that loads a graph from a binary file.

parameterdescription.para: Head of the linked list of vertices in the graph
Name of the file to load the graph from
Pointer to a boolean variable that will be set to true if the graph was successfully loaded

simplesect.para: : Head of the linked list of vertices in the loaded graph, or NULL if the file could not be opened

briefdescription.para: LoadAdj - Function that loads the adjacency lists of all vertices in a graph from binary files.

parameterdescription.para: Head of the linked list of vertices in the graph
Pointer to a boolean variable that will be set to true if all adjacency lists were successfully loaded

simplesect.para: : Head of the linked list of vertices in the graph with their adjacency lists loaded

briefdescription.para: Reads the initial data from two text files and creates a graph of routes and edges.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the graph of routes and edges.
Pointer to a boolean variable that will be set to true if any errors occur during the creation of the graph.
Pointer to an integer variable that will be incremented for each new vertex added to the graph.

simplesect.para: Pointer to the graph of routes and edges.

briefdescription.para: File containing the routes functions.

detaileddescription.para: This file contains the implementation of functions related to the management of routes with graphs

simplesect.para: Joo Pereira
